sections.heading: As used in this chapter, the term:(1)“Administrative probation” means a form of no contact, nonreporting supervision
sections.text: A court may order administrative probation, or the Department of Corrections may transfer an offender to administrative probation, as provided in s. 948.013.(2)“Child care facility”
